comment.body:
I mean I hope RaspeberryPi will have enough resources to host 100Gb of ZeroNet sites. Will see :)
Not going to make a gateway though, it's just a small home node
Ouch! I guess I didn't publish all parts of the site. Thanks for reporting!

thanks!
it was because it was already in the list (yeah, i've put it here for testing), but unfortunately my site didn't work well for duplicates. fixed already
Yes, I though about it. There is https://github.com/blockstack/blockchain-id But I'm not sure how I can be integrated
